title: Manage everything about your products
subTitle: Deliver product data to multi-channels, synchronize it across systems, and optimize it for more sales with IChiba OnePlatform’s Product Information Management (PIM).
keyBenefits.title: Key benefits
keyBenefits.subTitle: An all-in-one PIM solution makes it faster and easier to create and deliver compelling product experiences.

pimCanDo.title: See what our PIM can do for you
pimCanDo.subTitle: All the features you need to take your product information management to the next level with our simple, yet powerful PIM.

supportDesc: Our global team of feed specialists provide ongoing, 24/7 support that’s unrivaled in the industry
howPimHelpTitle: How PIM helps the entire team
sellingMoreDesc: Transform your data into product intelligence

collectSteps.title: Collect data
collectSteps.content: Gather data from all platforms - ERP, PLM, and more.

collectSteps.title: Import
collectSteps.content: Extract data and import through CSV and XLSX files and pre-built correctors.

collectSteps.title: Onboard product
collectSteps.content: Obtain product information in your format straight from vendors.

collectSteps.title: Connect
collectSteps.content: Connect to DAM (Digital Asset Management) platforms for documents, videos, and photos.

manageSteps.title: Classify
manageSteps.content: Classify products according to families, categories, or channels.

manageSteps.title: Measure
manageSteps.content: Analyse, regulate, and monitor the product data quality.

manageSteps.title: Govern
manageSteps.content: Manage processes using validation procedures, and users with roles and permissions.

manageSteps.title: Manage
manageSteps.content: Control publishing, versions, and catalogue completeness.

enrichSteps.title: Enrich
enrichSteps.content: Use data and technology to enrich product description, manage the import of product images and improve the conversion.

enrichSteps.title: Associate
enrichSteps.content: Associate relevant images, videos, and documents with each product to attacting customers with engaging visual and multimedia content.

enrichSteps.title: Leverage
enrichSteps.content: Use a rules engine to automate the enrichment of standard characteristics.

enrichSteps.title: Localize
enrichSteps.content: Automatically localize and translate product information according to each region and market.

distributeSteps.title: Manage
distributeSteps.content: Manage product catalogs for every sales channels on a single platfrom - IChiba OnePlatform’s PIM.

distributeSteps.title: Select
distributeSteps.content: Select channel-specific attributes for each channel for the most relevant experience.

distributeSteps.title: Integrate
distributeSteps.content: Integrate multi-channel sales via powerful API-based connectors.

distributeSteps.title: Syndicate catalogs
distributeSteps.content: Syndicate catalogs to third-party retail platforms and marketplaces.

canDoList.title: Centralized product data
canDoList.description: Distribute product data of any number of SKUs within a minute to multiple marketplaces. Manage multiple product variants from one convenient digital location.

canDoList.title: Categorize products
canDoList.description: Create collections based on any combination of attributes: product families, best-sellers, seasonal presents, and so on.

canDoList.title: Product data syndication
canDoList.description: Meticulously synchronizing product data across a board range of distinct sales portals with its own specialized set of data and product listing standards allows you to tap into the amazing marketing power of those unowned channels.

canDoList.title: Unlimited product attributes
canDoList.description: Offer a wide range of product types without limitation. Rich product information drives the customer decision-making process and enhances their satisfaction.

canDoList.title: Multi-warehouses/multi-channel inventory
canDoList.description: Track stock levels across multiples locations. Edit multiple products simultaneously. Check all out-of-stock items in seconds.

canDoList.title: Enrich product data
canDoList.description: Optimize product content for webshops with unlimited images & video links, improve data quality and relevance, boost SEO and create customer satisfaction.

canDoList.title: Seamless integration
canDoList.description: Cloud-first, API-centric appoarch allows connecting your PIM with both new and existing ecosystems, from eCommerce, DAM, print, and more.

canDoList.title: Omnichannel experience
canDoList.description: Manage product information across all selling channels, procurement systems while ensuring that data & digital assets are consistent across all touchpoints.

canDoList.title: AI-based analytics
canDoList.description: Powerful AI-based analytics enables tracking of user reviews, ratings, competitor assortment, and advertised prices.

integrationSubtitle: We tightly integrate with leading e-commerce platforms and marketplaces, allowing you to synchronize your product data across multiple sales channels effectively.

marketing.title: Marketing
marketing.content: Eliminate spreadsheets and repeat work to increase productivity, and efficiency, contributing to the development of amazing product experiences.

customerSuccess.title: Customer Success
customerSuccess.content: Bring products to market faster. Quickly adapt to changing assortments and buyer demands. Create appealing product experiences to increase brand loyalty with IChiba OnePlatform's PIM.

informationTechnology.title: Information Technology
informationTechnology.content: Our cloud-based PIM integrates an all-inclusive ecosystem of partners to help manage scalability, lower infreasture costs, and give developers the resources they require.

theCsuite.title: The C-suite
theCsuite.content: Grow business and increase market share with a larger catalog sold in multiple markets. Enhance conversions, reduce returns and save costs as PIM helps simplify operations and improve productivity.

pimFeaturesSubtitle: Our PIM solution helps you to increase your overall business productivity enabling you to earn more profits
storyTitle: IChiba OnePlatform’s PIM is suited for businesses of all sizes
sourceOfTrustTitle: A source of trust to manage everything about your products
sourceOfTrustSubtitle: A single source of truth in product information management
sourceOfTrustDesc: Remove the need for time-consuming product data sheet modification, stop worrying about launch delays, and boost ROI with best-in-class PIM solution
